articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: Carmakers slowly resuming production in China despite coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: A handful of international automakers with crucial production plants in China have announced they will be returning to work within the next few weeks.
articles.content:
A handful of international automakers with crucial production plants in China have announced they will be returning to work within the next few weeks, as the death toll and the number of new cases from the novel coronavirus continue to soar.

articles.title: Health officials trace British patient travels in outbreak
articles.description: A middle-aged businessman from England has illustrated how the ease of international travel is complicating global efforts to track and contain the new coronavirus that emerged inChina
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
A middle-aged businessman from England who vacationed in the Alps has illustrated how the ease of international travel is complicating global efforts to track and contain the new coronavirus that emerged in China.

articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: Food prices skyrocket in China amid coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: Food prices are soaring more than 20% in China amid the outbreak of the novel coronavirus, according to government statistics released Monday.
articles.content:
Food prices are soaring more than 20% in China amid the outbreak of the novel coronavirus, according to government statistics released Monday.
China's consumer price index (CPI) spiked 5.4% compared to this time last year, the country's state-run media organ… [+1261 chars]

articles.title: Sony, Amazon, NTT drop out of big tech show over virus
articles.description: Sony, Amazon and Japan's NTT DoCoMo are the latest companies to pull out of a major European technology show over virus fears
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
Two big Japanese companies are the latest to pull out of a major European technology show due to fears over the outbreak of the new coronavirus.

articles.title: 23 Americans on cruise ship in Japan contract novel coronavirus
articles.description: Over 40,000 people have contracted the novel coronavirus and 910 of them have died.

articles.title: New virus has infected more than 40,600 people globally
articles.description: A viral outbreak that began in China has infected more than 40,600 people globally

articles.title: Mainland China virus cases rise again after earlier decline
articles.description: Mainland China has reported another rise in cases of the new virus after a sharp decline the previous day, while the number of deaths grew by 97 to 908
articles.content:
